itunes:title: APR 25 2022 – ELON MUSK OFFICIALLY PURCHASES TWITTER
title: APR 25 2022 – ELON MUSK OFFICIALLY PURCHASES TWITTER
description:
Elon Musk and Twitter’s board have finalized a deal. All of this as Obama’s Ukraine envoy, Marie Yovanovitch admits that Putin wouldn’t have invaded Ukraine during a Trump administration, and a Blueanon lawyer puts Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene on trial over January 6th. Meanwhile, Beijing locks down some areas as COVID-19 cases increase, and the CCP is eyeing a military base in the Solomon Islands.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
